title: Help Id Decorative Fonts
content:
I love this style of type face.  
Any idea the name of these type faces?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112329im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/truth_6232.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112329im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/404917869_6cddfb2a72_3647.jpg)

 [‹ Nuptial invite font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112329/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39463 "Go to previous forum topic") [Deco ID Needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112329/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39448 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Butalezi

comments.content: and the second I think it’s [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112329/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001003)

Plumbago,  
You hit the nail on the head with Motter Femina.

Thanks very much to you and Patty Fab.

Cheers
